name: Random Jump
description:
A game for everyone. The score tracks how long you can dodge the obstacles. You can use this game for streaming on Twitch or YouTube or for videos.  It's royalty free. 

 If you only donate once a week please remember Random Jump next time!

Program and Images by QAXAR

Music by Loopop

INSTRUCTIONS

download the zip file.

extract the files (look it up on YouTube if you don't know how)

click the file that has ".exe" at the end. The game will load and you can start playing it.
